page.title: 17Family Life in Thurso
page.content: Our family normally gets up at about 6.45 a.m. because Mum and Dad both work at Dounreay. Breakfast is cereal and sometimes toast. When Martin and I are ready we go to a lady who looks after us until it's time for school.At school we play until the bell at 8.55 goes for going in.We then do maths and at 10.35 we go out to play.Lunchtime is at 12.45 and hometime is at 3.30. After school I go swimming,brownies or out to play. Our house has thirteen rooms and the heating is a pump which pumps hot water heated by a coal fire.In our family there are 4 people but most families in Thurso have about 4-6.Some of the machines that help with housework are a microwave oven and a vacuum cleaner.Our car is a Caravanette which is white and is 3 years old.It holds lots of people.
